== Curriculum Notes ==
As the EPC project grows we will be conducting classes based on the Ubuntu Training that was produced my the hard working people of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Training|Ubuntu Training Team]]</nowiki>, we at the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/NewMexicoTeam|New Mexico Loco Team]]</nowiki> would like to thank them for all their hard work and dedication.

Please follow this link to the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Training|Ubuntu Training Team]]</nowiki> to download the Student and Instructor training manuals in PDF format.

If you would like to help, you  will need to have a launchpad account and bzr set up on your computer. this is in order to retrieve the actual code and contribute or modify the content The launchpad branch is: http://launchpad.net/ubuntu-desktop-course
